Text:
Please seed this file for as long as you can. As far as I know, these are the only Anthony Demello MP3s available on the net. Amazing stuff indeed!

Enjoy.

Wow.  This is fantastic stuff.  If you are at all spiritually inclined, get this now!  It may change your life.

More than a conference...this is a spiritual atom bomb!   No wonder the Catholic Church tried to suppress this material.

Take a look at these three Tony de Mello videos posted on Google Video: 

http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=7194350940635121846&q=de+mello&total=1216&start=0&num=10&so=0&type=search&plindex=2
